articles.description: On the day of Austin Butler's final screen test for “Elvis," director Baz Luhrmann threw everything at him.  Butler had spent five months building up to that moment, workshopping the role with Luhrmann, doing hair and make-up tests, rehearsing the songs.
articles.content:
On the day of Austin Butlers final screen test for Elvis, director Baz Luhrmann threw everything at him. 
Butler had spent five months building up to that moment, workshopping the role with Luhrmann… [+7393 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Joy Parker
articles.title: Nick Jonas Shares Adorable Pic With Daughter Malti on His First Father's Day - E! NEWS
articles.description: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra shared how they marked their first Father's Day with 6-month-old daughter Malti Marie Chopra Jonas.
articles.content: In addition to his own family, Nick is uncle to Kevin and Danielle Jonas' daughters Alena, 8, and Valentina, 5, as well as Joe Jonas and his wife Sophie Turner's daughter Willa, 23 months. Sophie and… [+701 chars]
